info.name: YouTube  Dark Edition
info.description:
This is a combination of codes + my own additions for the new Youtube Cosmicpanda theme... All Dark !!!
The code is a little bit chaotic^^ cause i made it step by step... There's no CosmicPanda code yet...
But it works !
Just Dark, simple and minimalist.
Hope you enjoy...
